content: As you reach the pavilion, you'll encounter the same strange chubby little monk you may have spotted when first starting this chapter. The enigmatic monk seems interested in a Buddha statue up on the cliffs above with a big belly button, but it seems invisible to your eyes.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Bitter_Lake_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Bitter Lake Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Precept Corridor'.
The content is as follows:
As you reach the pavilion, you'll encounter the same strange chubby little monk you may have spotted when first starting this chapter. The enigmatic monk seems interested in a Buddha statue up on the cliffs above with a big belly button, but it seems invisible to your eyes.
